reviews.text: A recreational park in the outskirts of Hat Yai. Has a scenic view of Hat Yai city and great place to see the sunset.
I really suggest you guys to come here.. nice pointview... And begging you, please come here... Its was cool.. you can see parrot if you got your luck here...
good place to visit. Enjoying their culture.

We hiked this place and it's actually nice bit you can also go with a car. It is a nice place to go with your family. No entrance fees. But you have to pay for the cable car if you want to ride. Nice place to take photos especially in the afternoon. Has a beautiful view of the clouds and the sunset.
Gemreat place and great view. Hope the bushes were well maintain later
No doubt this is the best shopping mall in Hatyai. Lots of retail shops, After You is opening soon, cinema and lots of restaurants and good food.

Really nice mall! I didn't want to shop, but it seems like they everything you could want. Many American stores and non-American stores. I went to get dinner and some contact solution. The grocery store inside is huge and has a salad bar. 25 baht/100g. I got a yummy salad and some baked goods for a great price. I enjoyed walking around all the floors. The aircon was nice and I got my exercise for the day after being on a bus for 10 hours coming from Chumphon. This mall is 5 minutes from the bus station and right across the street from my beautiful hostel called Hybrit. Only staying for one night so this mall had everything I needed.
Huge shopping mall. Alot of eateries and restaurants. Clean toilets. Upmarket  place.

The only mall which cater the needs of overseas brands like Pandora, H&M, Uniqlo and Starbucks in Hatyai. Popular among locals especially youngsters. 

Parking is always full. You need to provide your identity card/passport before you can drive into the mall. Parking ia free.

Most outlets are not a Halal place. For Malaysian, you can find a good deal in H&M (Value and sales items).

If you want to do activity like ice skating, you can do it here. Price is cheap too.

Awesome shopping mall with everything you need!
Im come here for restock famous Thailand brand 'Beauty Cottage'

I really suggest you guys to come here.. nice pointview... And begging you, please come here... Its was cool.. you can see parrot if you got your luck here...
good place to visit. Enjoying their culture.

Nice place to take photos especially in the afternoon. Has a beautiful view of the clouds and the sunset.
Gemreat place and great view. Hope the bushes were well maintain later

Food:
Only bought food sold in small boats. All of them were delicious and cheap! So in love with fried rice sold there, cheap, but plenty. Many kinds of food is being sold here, so you can choose based on your taste.

Shopping experience:
Not so many choices can you choose from shops here, but lots of them were attractive for us.

Photoshoot:
Definitely a must when visiting this area. Really liked the view, and lots of interesting things for you to observe.

What a lovely place. Very good place to try many delicious food but make sure you cane here with empty stomach and long time to spend here. Nice place to visit especially at night. There not only have choices of food but also have souvenirs, leather purses and bags, drinks and also music...very happening. A must place should go if you came to Hatyai
You can enjoy view of sun set at the canal and took some nice pics with Burma temple near here. Foods it's okay for foriengners but not good taste enough for local people😌

What a lovely place. Plenty food stalls. Many other stalls selling wares ranging from bonsai to genuine leather bags and purses (crocodile). Not your average flea market. Clean toilets. Lots of place to sit and watch the hype of people around. You can also buy beer to enjoy with your food. Not all markets in Hatyai sell alcoholic beverages.
The variety of foods are great. Love the foods, drinks and the environment. Only one I dont like, there are a lot of dogs moving around and try to get foods from visitors

The temple has a very unique architecture, a pagoda made out of stainless steel rings. It is also called Stainless Steel Pagoda / Temple. 

The ground level of the pagoda has various statues and murals that seems to tell different tales of Buddha (all description are in Thai, and I don't know much about the tales of Buddha either). The upper level has wind chimes installed, the sound it made when the wind blows is so tranquil and serene. I really enjoyed the peacefulness from the wind chimes.

You'll need a chartered transport to get there - the pagoda is in the middle of hill / forestry. We chartered a car thru Grab (the Uber of South East Asia) for 4 hours, and visited the "Big Buddha" at Hatyai Municipal Park before coming over here.
U wont be able to expect like inside jungle place have such temple with steel design. Not bad to check out actually. Not everything from fb is lie. 😅

It is not easy to make one’s way to Phra Maha Chedi Tripob Trimongkol without private transport. The best option to visit is by chartering a tuk-tuk. Negotiate the fare as it could go as high as ฿800 (return). Always be reasonable but make sure that your tuk-tuk driver understands that he is to drive up the hill and not wait for you at the base of the hill! Your tuk-tuk driver will wait for you and send you back to the city, so your fare has to cover his waiting time as well. Pay him only after you get off the tuk-tuk in the city, or at an agreed destination. A visit to Phra Maha Chedi Tripob Trimongkol does not require too much time. However, once you are there, you would want to stay longer to enjoy its tranquility, especially on the upper level of the pagoda. Do bear in mind to dress appropriately when visiting temples and wats in Thailand.
There is different when you look that stainless steel temple with your eye and from camera. Very beautiful at night
Unique architecture built up with stainless steel material. Worth place to visit 👍🏻
อุทยานแห่งชาติเขาน้ำค้าง ดินแดนแห่งความอุดมสมบูรณ์ของพรรณไม้ภาคใต้
เยี่ยมชม ธรรมชาติที่งดงาม แหล่งท่องเที่ยวแห่งใหม่

reviews.author_name: ปัตมา แขวงบู

reviews.text: An interesting experience. A 1-hour boat ride cost 300 baht where the boat man takes you out for bird watching in the lake. It was lovely to feel the wind as the boat goes along the lake.
The best view to seeing wild bird. I never had experience to ride a boat before. And this is good place to do so.
Restaurant with good view of the lake ;-)
Expensive, terrible Tom yam.
Nice place to relax with family
Excellent place to visit but avoid week ends due to load of people. Also avoid peak seasons from march till may.
close already but stil in maps.. waste my time
I m against animal exploitation
Already closed for HATYAI branch.
Enjoy with the best nature elephants trekking and real ridding in the river and forest.

Im come here for restock famous Thailand brand 'Beauty Cottage'

UPDATE: No longer use Lavazza beans.

Old Info: Good Lavazza Cappuccino. Not many places in HatYai have Lavazza beans.
CoZy to have a coffee break ...here..frenly staff and clean environment
😘😋☺️ yummy yummy ... happy tummy
Very nice & delicious desserts. Cosy place. Friendly service.
It was fine.  Had a piece of Honey Toast which did it's job.  The shop just seems sterile, I think they need better seating.
For night time to meet close friend place.
Good atmosphere but super slow service even after repeated request.
I know that you can get better roti and tea in Hat Yai. Luckily this place isn't too expensive.
Ordinary roti and unfriendly staffs.
Good for hanging out, especially for halal lovers
Place is small but the food was really delicious...the owner of the restaurant was really friendly..reasonable price..
Cool place
อาหารหร่อยมากๆ
Located within walking distance to Lee Garden Hotel in Hatyai City center.Popular among muslim tourist.
good food..clean restaurant midrange price..

Ikan 3 Rasa & Curry Fried Crabs are a must try.
No regrets. Highly recommend it 😎
Food provided too little. Taste is ok
Slow service.maybe due to peak hour. Food just normal at higher price. Not recommended to any Malaysian. There are more nicer food around. Please avoid this place
Excellent quality fish, very good salmon cuts, good portions, authentically Japanese and very good prices. Worth coming to Hat Yai just for this place. :)
Great sushi and lovely atmosphere...good service and value for money.
Is good

The restaurant is nice and clean, and the staff is very friendly. The manager is absolutely lovely and determined to help us as tourists. She helped us finding accomodation and even requested one of her workers to drive us to our hotel for free, as it was late and we could be overcharged by tuktuk drivers.  I highly recommend this restaurant.
Nice to have Japanese food in hatyai
Nice food but too many customers, not enough tables

Nice pork knuckle. Food is delicious. Have good view of Hatyai from hill side. Is a little difficult to find the direction as Google map direction is incorrect. Pls turn right (not left) once you drive in from the main road. Is better come in evening to avoid the afternoon sun. Overall very good place for food and view. Price is reasonable. Parking is limited so take note.

Not recommend this place, taste so so , not worth for the price. We total order 7 dishes, after serve two dishes then have to wait 30minut for the rest, even that time only us they serve . What make me hate the most is the waitress there never smile, only showing bad attitude. We pay money for the food and service dude😠
Food is good. Pork knuckle one of the best so far in Hatyai. But waiters no speak English and hardly any other language. So keep to pointing at pictures in menu

Fantastic experience. Good food and fast served. Me and my wife ate 5 dishes for 1130tbh. Quite reasonable! A must visit place. Night scenery should be awesome. I can tell much because I was there for lunch!

Finally, a place with vegetarian options! 
The food was yummy, and the wall decor was cool. The owner can communicate decently in English and Mandarin Chinese and probably other languages too.

Came here after reading so many head ups . Disappointed to say that It’s kind of over rated . All portions are too small for a meal. It would be just nice for a bite. Tomyum fried rice tasted good but slightly oily, the stir fried minced  pork was salty.. pad Thai was watery.

Food was delicious but a bit pricey. Portion was quite small as well. Anyway it's an air-conded restaurant . The owner speaks Mandarin and the menu have both eng & Chinese description so no problem ordering
Delicious food, price above average, portion small, friendly owner, opposite of odean mall
It's a good place for breakfast. However, if you are expecting antipodean big breakfast with cheap price, this is not a place for you. A bit pricy tbh.
Great coffee and tea~ You may charge your phone at the restaurant…

อาหารอร่อย ราคาไม่แพง แนะนำ ข้าวยำปักษ์ใต้
ข้าวหมกไก่ อาหารเช้า
อร่อย ราคาย่อมเยา

Truly local hangout as can be seen from the diners and the price. We had the good fortune of tasting some authentic but less common Thai food. I can't really remember the name of each of them but you can see from my photo attached. A must order dish is the deep fried fish cut into cube complimented with flavorful herbs. The aged furniture and familiar ambience is redolent of yesteryear!

Disappointed as I asked for little extra spicy for my glass noodle with prawn n came burning hot that I can't even eat 2 spoons .... similarly for my daughter's prawn fried rice .... not edible .... super burning spicy. Asked for less sugar lime juice n got totally no sugar drink. The lady seem good in English but not sure where the breakdown happen. I'll not come to this place again. Price just normal .... nothing great.

Delicious food and affordable pricing. Papaya salad is awesome. Tom yum... spicy.... 
And interesting rice noodle cooking style.
Overrated. Food okay. Don't give too high expectation. Pad thai 70 baht. Fried rice 70 baht.
Delicious and value for money.
Nice food, good service, looking for Chinese food
Got a very nice vegetarian sets too
Chinese restaurant , good quality with accepted price
Great Chinese foods here.
Good Chinese restaurant with reasonable price.
Excellent fusion food, great customer service and great dining experience. Will definitely visit again.
Sure the best food you get in town. Friendly but not trained staff. Great place
good enviroment, relax and quiet. slightly higher price but worth with the quality. serve few import beer.

This is definitely a hidden gem in Hatyai... Steaks are just so good and well marinated... Lots of german beer choices here. Owner Jan and her crew was so warm and made us something special off menu. Roast lamb slices was just so juicy and cooked just perfect. It is a dim type romantic dining place good for couples.
 (P/S Just need to bring own mosquito repellent spray since its kindda open air concept)

We didn't stay for long, as we had a train to catch, and didn't have time for food. The beer list, however, is well-curated, and each beer is lovingly described to give you a clear idea of what you're ordering. If you sit at the bar you may even get to chat with the owner, who speaks German, Thai, and English (at least).
